sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Settings = () => { const [settings, setSettings] = useState({ companyName: 'Smart Systems Inc.', timezone: 'UTC-08:00', currency: 'USD', email: 'jane.doe@smartsystems.com', emailNotifications: true, inAppNotifications: false }); const handleSave = () => { console.log('Saving settings:', settings); // Add API call to save settings }; return (
{/* Header */}
S
Smart Systems
Dashboard Orders Products Customers Reports Settings
{/* Sidebar */}
Dashboard Orders Products Customers Reports Settings
{/* Main Content */}

Settings

{/* General Settings */}

General

Update your company's details.

setSettings({...settings, companyName: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-4 py-2 bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 rounded-lg text-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-500 focus:border-transparent" />
{/* Account Settings */}

Account

Manage your account settings.

setSettings({...settings, email: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-4 py-2 bg-gray-700 border border-gray-600 rounded-lg text-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-500 focus:border-transparent" />
{/* Notifications */}

Notifications

Control how you receive notifications.

Email Notifications

Receive notifications for new orders, cancellations, and updates.

In-App Notifications

Get alerts for important events and reminders.

{/* Integrations */}

Integrations

Connect with third-party services.

Payment Gateway

Connect your payment gateway for seamless transactions.

Accounting Software

Integrate for financial management.

{/* User Profile Footer */}
JD
Jane Doe
View profile
); }; export default Settings;
